title: Glitchhikers: Deluxe Soundtrack 5-Volume Set
description: Chill out as you journey through the spaces between spaces, with the 5-Volume Deluxe Soundtrack for Glitchhikers: The Spaces Between, 71 tracks representing all the music in the game.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ABOUT THIS CONTENT
<!--text-->
Close your eyes and experience the vibes of the spaces between spaces. A lonely park filled with sculptures. A drive during the witching hour with the stars glittering like shimmering specks of sand. A late night train carriage, gently rocking as it travels to its eventual destination.
 
This Deluxe 5-Volume Set of music will guide you on your journey through the spaces between â€“ 71 tracks representing all the music in the game, including a 10-track anthology of guest composers, featuring a brand new song from Canadian indie rock band TOPS.
